page.title: 02MALVERN HILLS Hang Gliding.
page.content:
MALVERN HILLS Hang Gliding {
On the Malvern Hills a lot of hang gliding is done. One of our teachers did it but when he tried to land he slipped and hurt his ancle. He was on crutches for weeks. The Malvern Hills run north and south and the easterly winds blow up and off,that's why it is so good for hang gliding. The sport may look easy but it is quite hard, I have seen lots crash. Even people that have been hang gliding for five years still crash. Sunday is the day when most hang gliding is done.Up to a dozen people do it on a sunday when it is not raining. Hang gliders come in lots of colours.
